issue.subject: add proxy for mode zoning
issue.description:
he download feature in "diffusion" has the "zoning" mode (the file is uploading via a MAP which offers n URL via a WFS, each URL corresponds to another file for another area).

Problem : with the current code, the remote URL is visible. It is OK when the data has a public access scope. But if access scope is "private", the URLs remains accessibles for any one who knows the URL.

Proposition : add a proxy feature to hide remote URLs and secure them (ask for login/password)

Oour proposition will follow...

journals.notes: Duplicate : This has been implemented here #1042 and #1159
